home.title: Sophia Chen - Tech Portfolio
home.heroSubtitle: Software Engineer & Content Creator from San Francisco, CA
home.aboutText: I'm a software engineer passionate about building innovative solutions and sharing my knowledge with the tech community. I specialize in web development, with a focus on creating user-friendly and efficient applications. In my free time, I enjoy writing articles, creating videos, and exploring new technologies.

projectAlpha.title: Project Alpha
projectAlpha.description: A web application for managing tasks and projects.
projectAlpha.fullDescription: A comprehensive task and project management web application designed to streamline team collaboration and boost productivity. Built with modern web technologies and featuring an intuitive user interface.
projectAlpha.technicalImplementation: The application follows a modern full-stack architecture with a React frontend and Node.js backend. The frontend utilizes React hooks for state management and implements a component-based architecture for maximum reusability and maintainability.
projectAlpha.challenges: One of the main challenges was implementing real-time synchronization across multiple users while maintaining data consistency. We solved this by implementing a robust conflict resolution system and optimistic updates.
projectAlpha.results: The application has been successfully deployed and is being used by over 500 teams worldwide, with a 95% user satisfaction rate and 40% improvement in team productivity metrics.

mobileAppBeta.title: Mobile App Beta
mobileAppBeta.description: A mobile app for tracking fitness goals and progress.
mobileAppBeta.fullDescription: A cross-platform mobile application for fitness tracking and goal setting, built with React Native and featuring offline sync capabilities.

dataInsightsDashboard.title: Data Insights Dashboard
dataInsightsDashboard.description: A dashboard for visualizing key performance indicators.
dataInsightsDashboard.fullDescription: An interactive dashboard for visualizing business metrics and KPIs, built with modern data visualization libraries.

reactHooksGuide.title: Mastering React Hooks: A Comprehensive Guide
reactHooksGuide.description: Learn how to effectively use React Hooks to manage state and side effects in your applications.

techInterviewProcess.title: Navigating the Tech Interview Process
techInterviewProcess.description: Tips and strategies for successfully navigating the technical interview process and landing your dream job.

tailwindTutorial.title: Building a Responsive Website with Tailwind CSS
tailwindTutorial.description: A step-by-step tutorial on creating a responsive website using the Tailwind CSS framework.

dayInLife.title: A Day in the Life of a Software Engineer
dayInLife.description: Follow along as I share a typical day in my life as a software engineer, from coding to meetings and more.

about.title: About - Sophia Chen
about.myStoryText1: My journey into software engineering began during my computer science studies at UC Berkeley, where I discovered my passion for creating digital solutions that make a real impact. What started as curiosity about how websites work evolved into a deep love for full-stack development.
about.myStoryText2: Over the past five years, I've had the privilege of working with amazing teams at both startups and established tech companies. I've contributed to products used by millions of users, led development teams, and mentored junior developers.

contact.title: Contact - Sophia Chen
contact.subtitle: I'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a project in mind, want to collaborate, or just want to say hello.
contact.socialDescription: Follow me on social media for updates on my latest projects and insights.
